summary: totally don’t have to answer if you’re not comfortable, but what do you think could/would push Aziraphale to safeword? (not that...
question: totally don’t have to answer if you’re not comfortable, but what do you think could/would push Aziraphale to safeword? (not that I think he’d ever really have to, I think him and Crowley are well attuned to one another,, Crowley probably knows Zira inside and out better than Zira himself does and would probably be able to tell the instance something was even slightly off) and how do you think Crowley would react to Aziraphale having to safeword (other than obviously stopping immediately?)
answer:
good question anon! honestly, i think ANY sexual relationship, no matter how kinky they are or how well they know each other, should have a safeword, because you never know when it’s gonna be needed. and yes that safeword can easily be ‘stop’, but everyone’s different so i just think that, no matter what it is, it needs to be mutually agreed on that THIS word or action means to stop. 

i think for aziraphale, it would be a situation involving overstimulation and sensory deprivation. i headcanon him as needing a lot of direct contact with crowley during kinky sex to keep him calm–so like talking to crowley, being able to see crowley, touching crowley, etc. any kind of sensory deprivation takes that away and if it gets to be too much, he’d safeword or safegesture (if he’s gagged) to stop.

and overstimulation because i just headcanon crowley as the type who can get REALLY carried away, so sometimes zira does need to get him to stop completely or just slow it down. 

as for how crowley reacts, i think it depends! if zira just uses it and is able to explain why, like ‘let’s just slow down a bit’ or ‘my arms really hurt, can we continue without the restraints?’, crowley can do that. but if zira is REALLY freaking out, unable to explain why, he feels so guilty and isn’t in the mood for ANYTHING kinky for a long time. he makes sure to comfort his angel and cuddle and talk about what went wrong when zira’s ready to, but eventually, zira ends up comforting him too, reassuring crowley that he’s not an awful person.

summary: Headcanon that Aziraphale doesn’t really enjoy modern music that much but one song (“Genie In A Bottle” by Brittany Spears) is...
question: Headcanon that Aziraphale doesn’t really enjoy modern music that much but one song (“Genie In A Bottle” by Brittany Spears) is one that he kinda enjoys and plays it sometimes when he is organizing his books. Cue Crowley walking in and seeing his husband jamming out, scream/singing the lyrics and dancing and basically dies on the spot because of how sexy AND adorable Zira looks and Zira is just confused and a little embarrassed 🤣💖 ((I just really like that song OKAY DONT JUDGE ME HDHDJJD 🙈))
answer:
*edit to last ask cause I’m stoopid: “Genie in a bottle” is by Christina Aguilera not Brittany Spears 😂 lol oops

OOOOOHHHH YES OMG crowley doesn’t even say anything because he just, totally coincidentally, HAPPENS to keep walking in while zira’s organizing books and maybe just h a p p e n s to take a phone recording for himself

tags: WE LOVE AND RESPECT ZIRA'S THIGHS
summary: CROWLEY LOVES AZIRAPHALE'S THIGHS SO MUCH. They're just so soft and warm and pale. Crowley refuses to admit it, but he cried a...
question: CROWLEY LOVES AZIRAPHALE'S THIGHS SO MUCH. They're just so soft and warm and pale. Crowley refuses to admit it, but he cried a little the first time he saw them. He just loves every freckle and stretch mark so very much. And Zira's thighs are so much thicker than Crowley's, which means there's so much there for Crowley to love! Sometimes he has Zira sit on his lap so he can feel all cozy and secure, happily trapped under his preciously plump angel.
answer: fsiudfhsSFDUISDFUSDF YES ABSOLUTELY TRUE and like, not only does he ALWAYS kiss them and nibble on them when given the chance, he just jumps at every opportunity to touch them, like rubbing lotion on them when they get chafed, laying his head on them when taking a nap, hoisting zira up from underneath his thighs when they kiss–he fuckign LOVES zira’s thighs
